agg.parser
Interface LayeredPairContainer

All Superinterfaces:
PairContainer, XMLObject
All Known Implementing Classes:
LayeredDependencyPairContainer, LayeredExcludePairContainer
public interface LayeredPairContainer
extends PairContainer

This class combines two aspects. The first is the well know pair container algorithm. The second is the algorithm for layer.
